## Introduction

```{r}
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
seqif_quants <- fread("./review/all_cell_types_per_region_final.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(seqif_quants,aes(timepoint,mean_count)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  # Add error bars
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean_count - se_count, ymax = mean_count + se_count),
                width = 0.2) +
  facet_grid(final_cell_type ~ region_name,
             scales = "free_y")
```
